Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
Post.raw:
---
title: Hello World
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: hexo-butterfly
Post.author: Ming Huang
Post._content:
## 

HuxProhexobutterflymelodybutterfly

## 

[Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/index.html)[Confucianmen](https://www.jianshu.com/p/50a565adaf15)[ShanGuBlog](http://shangu127.top/2021/01/28//#), [Moqiqiuzi](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_43857095/article/details/108306164)

1. Hexo
    Hexonode.jsnpmubuntu`sudo apt install nodejs npm`nodejsubuntu10.19.0NodejsNodeSource
        ```
        sudo npm install n -g
        sudo n stable
        hash -r 
        # 
        ```
    nodeJsnpmhexo `npm install hexo-cli -g`

1. 
    `hexo init blog`

1.  
    ```
    npm i hexo-theme-butterfly # butterfly hexo version> 5, 5
    #  _config.yml "theme: landscape" "theme: butterfly"
    npm install hexo-renderer-pug hexo-renderer-stylus --save
    cp node_modules/hexo-theme-butterfly/_config.yml _config.butterfly.yml # 
    ```

1. 
    _config.butterfly.yml[](https://www.jianshu.com/p/50a565adaf15)

1. 
    ```
    hexo c && hexo g && hexo s # clean, generate static web and start server
    ```

## 
- html
    html[Chak Aciano](https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_58068682/article/details/116611715) html
    1. source(demo)
        `hexo new page demo`
    1. _config.yml
        ```
        skip_render: 
            - 'demo/*'
        ```
    1. .md`[xxx](demo/xxx.html)`[Chak](https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_58068682/article/details/116611715)

- 
    - `node_modules/hexo-theme-butterfly/source/img``/img/404-bg.jpg`

    - `![XXX](https:XXX)`

    - `hexo-asset-image`
        - `_config.yml``post_asset_folder`true
        `relative_link`true
        - `npm install hexo-asset-image --save`[__](https://blog.csdn.net/m0_43401436/article/details/107191688)`npm install https://github.com/CodeFalling/hexo-asset-image --save`
        - .md
        - `![demo](demo.jpg)``hexo g`_post(2020, 2022)serverhexo-asset-image
        ![demo](demo.jpg)

- git

    3. 
        ```
        hexo clean
        hexo g
        hexo d
        ```

Post.title: redmine
Post.subtitle: redmine Installation
Post.author: Ming Huang
Post._content:
## 

redminegitlab

## 

redmine[](https://www.redmine.org/projects/redmine/wiki/RedmineInstall) [zhao_ning_ha](https://blog.csdn.net/zhao_ning_ha/article/details/70240437)

ubuntuubuntu 20.04ARM64ubuntuarm64 arch

redmine ruby, rail, mysqlPostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL serverSQLite

1. ruby, railsmysql
    ```
    sudo apt update
    sudo apt install ruby
    sudo gem install rails
    sudo apt install mysql-server mysql-client
    ```
1. MySQL> 5.5.2, utf8mb4, redmine`Mysql2::Error: Table 'redmine.roles' doesn't exist: SHOW FULL FIELDS FROM ``roles`` Default configuration data was not loaded.`utf8
    ```
    > mysql 
        CREATE DATABASE redmine CHARACTER SET utf8;
        CREATE USER 'redmine'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'my_password';
        GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON redmine.* TO 'redmine'@'localhost';
    ```
    redmine my_password
1. redmine[](https://www.redmine.org/projects/redmine/wiki/Download) 
    ```
    wget https://www.redmine.org/releases/redmine-4.2.6.tar.gz
    tar -xvf redmine-4.2.6.tar.gz
    cd redmine-4.2.6
    cp config/database.yml.example config/database.yml
    vi config/database.yml

    # productionsql
    # database.yml
    production:
        adapter: mysql2
        database: redmine
        host: localhost
        username: redmine
        password: "my_password" 
    ```
1. gem
    ```
    gem install bundler
    bundle install --without development test 
    ```
    gem
    ```
    sudo apt install ruby-dev # 
    gem install bundler
    sudo apt install imagemagick libmagickwand-dev
    gem install rmagick
    sudo apt install mysql-client libmysqlclient-dev
    gem install mysql2 
    gem install nokogiri
    sudo apt install libxslt-dev libxml2-dev
    bundle install # 
    ```
1. 
    ```
    rake generate_secret_token
    RAILS_ENV=production bundle exec rake db:migrate
    RAILS_ENV=production REDMINE_LANG=en bundle exec rake redmine:load_default_data 
    # 
    rake db:migrate RAILS_ENV=production
    ```
1. 
    ```
    mkdir -p tmp tmp/pdf public/plugin_assets
    # redmine 
    sudo chown -R redmine:redmine files log tmp public/plugin_assets
    sudo chmod -R 755 files log tmp public/plugin_assets
    ```
1. 
    ```
    bundle exec rails server webrick -e production
    # localhost: 127.0.0.1, ipifconfig
    ```
1. vscode server
   code-server armserverbin/code-server```0.0.0.0:8686```code-server```IP8686```vscode

Post.title: GROMACS, VMD
Post.subtitle: GROMACS, VMD Installation
Post.author: Ming Huang
Post._content:
## 



## 

2D Ising Model

\Delta t

### GROMACS
GROMACS 
1. Ubuntu `sudo apt-get install gromacs`, 2018.1GPU
* pre-request
```
apt-cache show gromacs
```
2. GROMACS ([Dirty installation](http://manual.gromacs.org/documentation/2020/install-guide/index.html "Dirty installation"))
* CC++ CMake > 3.9.6
* [](http://manual.gromacs.org/documentation/ "")
* 
```
> tar -zxvf gromacs-2020.tar.gz
> cd gromacs-2020
> mkdir build
> cd build
```
* `-DGMX_MPI=ON`GPU `-DGMX_GPU=on`, `nvcc`NVIDIA 
```
> cmake .. -DGMX_BUILD_OWN_FFTW=ON -DREGRESSIONTEST_DOWNLOAD=ON
> make -j32 # 32CPU
> make check
> sudo make install
> source /usr/local/gromacs/bin/GMXRC
```
GROMACS`gmx_mpi -v` GROMACS

### VMD
VMD

* VMD[](https://www.ks.uiuc.edu/Research/vmd/ "")VMDVMDVMDmanual[](https://www.ks.uiuc.edu/Research/vmd/current/ig/ig.html "")
* configure
* 
```
> ./configure #
> cd src
> sudo make install
> vmd # Startup VMD
```

### 
pymolavogadroubuntu`apt-get install pymol` `apt-get install avogadro`homebrew
